pr_title: Dynamodb-enhanced [preview]: Renamed MappedDatabase interfaces as Dyn…

timeline.bodyText: Do we need the "DynamoDbEnahncedAsyncClient." prefix given this is the lowest level interface?
timeline.author: spfink

replies.bodyText: No, I think this was the IDE that took initiative. I'll remove it.
replies.author: cenedhryn

timeline.bodyText: Can we not update the second sentence rather than remove it?
timeline.author: spfink

replies.bodyText: To what though? The implementation is internal. Do we refer to internal annotated classes?
replies.author: cenedhryn

timeline.bodyText: Can probably remove it here too
timeline.author: spfink

timeline.message: Dynamodb-enhanced [preview]: Renamed MappedDatabase interfaces as DynamoDbEnhancedClients and added builders to client interfaces
